alert.note: Alert for Crockett (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS San Angelo (Central Texas San Angelo)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 27 at 6:04PM CDT by NWS San Angelo
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT CENTRAL CROCKETT COUNTY THROUGH 645 PM CDT... At 604 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near The Intersection Of I-10 And Highway 290, or 19 miles west of Ozona, moving south at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor hail damage to vegetation is possible. Locations impacted include... Ft Lancaster, The Intersection Of I-10 And Highway 405, and The Intersection Of I-10 And Highway 290. This includes Interstate 10 between Mile Markers 330 and 353. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
